channel.title: Threat Intelligence Garden
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Threat Intelligence Garden

item.title: (banks: Bank of America, US Bancorp, Fifth Third Bank, Citigroup, PNC, BB&T, Wells Fargo, Capital One and HSBC)
item.description: (banks: Bank of America, US Bancorp, Fifth Third Bank, Citigroup, PNC, BB&T, Wells Fargo, Capital One and HSBC) A page for the sector (banks: Bank of America, US Bancorp, Fifth Third Bank, Citigroup, PNC, BB&T, Wells Fargo, Capital One and HSBC).

item.title: 16 countries in the Middle East, Europe, Asia and Africa
item.description: 16 countries in the Middle East, Europe, Asia and Africa A page for the country 16 countries in the Middle East, Europe, Asia and Africa.

item.title: 8220 Gang
item.description: 8220 Gang Description (Trend Micro) 8220 Gang (also known as “8220 Mining Group,” derived from their use of port 8220 for command and control or C&C communications exchange) has been active since 2017 and continues to scan for vulnerable applications in cloud and container environments.

item.title: ALTDOS, Desorden
item.description: ALTDOS, Desorden Description (Group-IB) Group-IB, a leading creator of cybersecurity technologies to investigate, prevent, and fight digital crime, announced today that it has contributed to a joint operation of the Royal Thai Police and the Singapore Police Force which led to the arrest of an indiv...

item.title: APEC and OSCE
item.description: APEC and OSCE A page for the country APEC and OSCE.

item.title: APT 19, Deep Panda, C0d0so0
item.description: APT 19, Deep Panda, C0d0so0 Description APT 19 is a Chinese-based threat group that has targeted a variety of industries, including defense, finance, energy, pharmaceutical, telecommunications, high tech, education, manufacturing, and legal services.

item.title: APT 20, Violin Panda
item.description: APT 20, Violin Panda Description (Palo Alto) We’ve uncovered some new data and likely attribution regarding a series of APT watering hole attacks this past summer.

item.title: APT 29, Cozy Bear, The Dukes
item.description: APT 29, Cozy Bear, The Dukes Description (F-Secure) The Dukes are a well-resourced, highly dedicated and organized cyberespionage group that we believe has been working for the Russian Federation since at least 2008 to collect intelligence in support of foreign and security policy decision-making.

item.title: APT 30, Override Panda
item.description: APT 30, Override Panda Description APT 30 is a threat group suspected to be associated with the Chinese government.

item.title: APT 31, Judgment Panda, Zirconium
item.description: APT 31, Judgment Panda, Zirconium Description FireEye characterizes APT31 as an actor specialized on intellectual property theft, focusing on data and projects that make a particular organization competetive in its field.
